Text.Language: Bwl e~bol ,w e~bol a~ricun,wrin nan Vnou] n~nenparaptwma: n/e~tanaitou qen penouws nem n/e~tanaitou qen penouws an: n/e~tanaitou qen oue~mi: nem n/e~tanaitou qen oumetate~mi: n/eth/p nem n/eyouwnh e~bol: P[oic eke~,au nan e~bol: eybe pekran eyouab e~taumou] m~mof e~h~r/i e~jwn.

Loose, remit, and forgive us, O God, our transgressions which we have committed willingly and which we have committed unwillingly, which we have committed knowingly and which we have committed unknowingly; the hidden and the manifest, O Lord, remit for us, for the sake of Your holy name which is called upon us.
